eip155:1/erc20:0xed4064f376cb8d68f770fb1: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](https://app.shapeshift.com/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [CRV](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xd533a949740bb3306d119cc777fa900ba034cd52) and [ETH](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/slip44:60). To acquire Curve CRV-ETH, deposit CRV and/or ETH on [Curve](https://curve.fi/crveth/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.
eip155:1/erc20:0x5a6a4d54456819380173272: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](https://app.shapeshift.com/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [MIM](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x99d8a9c45b2eca8864373a26d1459e3dff1e17f3) and [3CRV](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6c3f90f043a72fa612cbac8115ee7e52bde6e490). [3CRV](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6c3f90f043a72fa612cbac8115ee7e52bde6e490) is another curve LP token that consists of [DAI](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f), [USDT](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7), and [USDC](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48). To acquire crvMIM, deposit [MIM](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x99d8a9c45b2eca8864373a26d1459e3dff1e17f3), [DAI](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f), [USDT](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xdac17f958d2ee523a2206206994597c13d831ec7), and/or [USDC](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48) on [Curve](https://curve.fi/mim/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss but because all of the assets in the pool are pegged to $1, impermanent loss is unlikely and would only result if one of the assets in the pool lost its peg.
eip155:1/erc20:0x4da27a545c0c5B758a6BA10: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](https://app.shapeshift.com/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [ADAI](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x028171bca77440897b824ca71d1c56cac55b68a3), [AUSDC](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xbcca60bb61934080951369a648fb03df4f96263c) and [AUSDT](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x3ed3b47dd13ec9a98b44e6204a523e766b225811). To acquire crvAAVE, deposit [ADAI](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x028171bca77440897b824ca71d1c56cac55b68a3), [AUSDC](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xbcca60bb61934080951369a648fb03df4f96263c) and [AUSDT](https://app.shapeshift.com/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0x3ed3b47dd13ec9a98b44e6204a523e766b225811) on [Curve](https://curve.fi/aave/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.
